name: C-plus-plus-games
tagline: Games written C++  and played on the command line the games are: Black Jack, Guess Number, Rock Paper Scissors, Slot Machine, Tic Tac Toe, Hal 2001, Hang Man
body: Simple games that where created when I was learning the C++ language. They are just run using standard input/output on the command line.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
